column4: ok while waiting for the installation to go on, i hv a question, i used windows 98SE, and everytime i didn't shutdown properly, then the "bluescreen" scandisk appeared, I skipped it, and if i always do this to my windows 98SE, now I want to install ubuntu hoary on that same comp, get rid of windows, is it related to the problem i mentioned just now, fail to partition my hard disk?
correction: actually it's not fail to _partition_, u need to format after u do the partitioning right? I can't format
u'd better get breezy, either by download or to your nearest newspaper agent
